content:
The Administrative Services Center (CNAP) will be the "only window" of receiving services for veterans and their families.

About thisinformsMinistry of Reintegration of Temporarily Occupied Territories of Ukraine.

Thus, a weekly meeting on veterans policy presented a presentation "One Window at CNAP, as a tool for providing quality administrative services to veterans and their families." It contains specific ways of integration of all possible services for veterans into the CNAP system, which are more adapted to new challenges.

In general, the creation in the CNAP "Single Window" will provide for veterans:

  • formation of a single base of services for war veterans;
  • maximum awareness of their capabilities;
  • creation of convenient, qualitative and affordable conditions for receiving administrative services;
  • Implementation of a comprehensive approach - obtaining a range of administrative services in one place from one or more entities providing such services.

"To simplify the lives of veterans and their families, an approach is already being introduced, which will allow one package of documents to contact the CNAP, which will further distribute the data obtained to all the necessary entities," - said in the Ministry of reintegration.

Recall that the governmentincreasedThe amount of state social assistance to children of dead defenders.
